text: Hansbrough's 20 points and the Heels putting away Evansville 91-73 were afterthoughts, the entire night was dedicated to the historic event inside the Dean Smith Center. The game was stopped following the basket to recognize the achievement, and the celebration continued after the game when Hansbrough addressed the crowd. UNC officials bottled his tears so that scientists can study their possible healing ability.
title: Tyler Hansbrough broke Phil Ford's 30-year hold on the all-time North Carolina scoring record last night with an otherwise routine turnaround shot that never looks pretty with 7:41 left in the 1st half.
